snippet: Lara Gut of Switzerland beat Lindsey Vonn by 0.01 of a second on Friday to win a World Cup supercombined race in Val d’Isère, France, and deprive Vonn of a fifth straight win.
abstract: Switzerland's Lara Gut beats American Lindsey Vonn, four-time winner, by hundredth of second in World Cup supercombined race in Val d’Isere, France; other skiing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lara Gut of Switzerland beat Lindsey Vonn by 0.01 of a second on Friday to win a World Cup supercombined race in Val d’Isère, France, and deprive Vonn of a fifth straight win.
